outline:
1. to hold a feast, hold a festival, make pilgrimage, keep a pilgrim-feast, celebrate, dance, stagger
    1. (Qal)
      1. to keep a pilgrim-feast
      2. to reel
kjv_def: celebrate, dance, (keep, hold) a (solemn) feast (holiday), reel to and fro.
strongs_def: properly, to move in acircle, i.e. (specifically) to march in asacred procession, to observe afestival; by implication, to be giddy
